tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ajay Rao is a very competent and kind doctor. During my first consultation, he patiently asked several questions to understand the background and thoughtly analyzed the issue. He was not rushed in his physical check of the knee. He then took the time to summarize his root cause hypothesis, describe the next steps and provide recommendations on proper care & exercise. Through my two visits, he was unfailingly courteous and his course of action helped me get over my knee issues. Highly recommend Dr. Rao.

Very neat and clean premises,  on time appointment,  supporting staff and Dr. has taken sufficient time to identify the issue and according suggested for x-ray...best part Dr. Ajay sir want to make sure there won't be any serious threat and once he satisfied than only he given final conclusion.  Thank you Dr. Ajay sir and team.

review: My son had swelling in left foot by twisting his ankle and on consulting the doctor diagnosed correctly and told it is just muscle sprain and no fracture and xray not required. Advised just crepe bandage for 10 days and my son started to go to school from 3rd day and within 5th day had removed the bandage to school and was ok and recovered fully so thanks to doctor for correct advice and treatment.
